chapters.name: Getting Started
chapters.description: This chapter introduces the basic keys and starts with simple exercises to get familiar with the keyboard layout.

exercises.name: Exercise 1: Single Key Familiarization
exercises.description: Begin with simple key strikes to get used to the key positions.
exercises.tasks: A S D F J K L Ø A S D F J K L Ø

exercises.name: Exercise 2: Pair Combinations
exercises.description: Learn to type common pairs found in Norwegian language.
exercises.tasks: er er er⏎st st st⏎de de de⏎kj kj kj⏎ha ha ha

chapters.name: Building Speed
chapters.description: Focus on increasing typing speed with familiar key combinations and introducing new characters.

exercises.name: Exercise 3: Trio Combinations
exercises.description: Type short strings that are common in Norwegian.
exercises.tasks: ett ett ett⏎and and and⏎som som som⏎for for for

exercises.name: Exercise 4: Full Left Hand Combinations
exercises.description: Use the left hand for some simple words and patterns.
exercises.tasks: fart fart fart⏎salt salt salt⏎last last last⏎flaske flaske flaske

chapters.name: Mastering the Home Row
chapters.description: Master the home row keys with exercises that use all fingers and introduce shifting.

exercises.name: Exercise 5: Full Right Hand Combinations
exercises.description: Right hand exercises, now with a few Norwegian twists.
exercises.tasks: måne måne måne⏎klokke klokke klokke⏎stjerne stjerne stjerne⏎fjell fjell fjell

exercises.name: Exercise 6: Upper Row Introduction
exercises.description: Meet the upper row with some easy Norwegian words.
exercises.tasks: rød rød rød⏎tak tak tak⏎pine pine pine⏎quart quart quart

chapters.name: Expanding to the Whole Keyboard
chapters.description: Expand your reach to the entire keyboard, practicing upper and lower rows and incorporating more complex combinations.

exercises.name: Exercise 7: Lower Row Introduction
exercises.description: Get to know the lower row through some common bases and suffixes.
exercises.tasks: zoo zoo zoo⏎vann vann vann⏎bok bok bok⏎lys lys lys

exercises.name: Exercise 8: Shift Key Usage
exercises.description: Practice using the shift key for Norwegian letters and punctuation.
exercises.tasks: Å å Å å Å⏎Ø ø Ø ø Ø⏎Æ æ Æ æ Æ⏎? ! ? ! ?

chapters.name: Punctuation and Capitalization
chapters.description: Learn to seamlessly type punctuation, practice capitalization, and type out sentences.

exercises.name: Exercise 9: Simple Words Formation
exercises.description: Create simple words to practice fluid motion across the keyboard.
exercises.tasks: katt katt katt⏎hund hund hund⏎båt båt båt⏎bil bil bil

exercises.name: Exercise 10: Easy Sentences Construction
exercises.description: Build up to easy sentences that make typing practice fun.
exercises.tasks: En rød rev⏎Katten sover⏎Hunden løper fort⏎Bilen stopper brått

chapters.name: Speed and Efficiency
chapters.description: This chapter helps improve typing speed and efficiency with a focus on drills that encourage quick and accurate keystrokes.

exercises.name: Exercise 11: Speed Drills - Home Row
exercises.description: Drills designed to increase speed on the home row.

exercises.name: Exercise 12: Speed Drills - Upper and Lower Rows
exercises.description: Mixed exercises to improve speed across all rows.

chapters.name: Advanced Text Practice
chapters.description: These exercises involve typing out longer and more complex text passages to solidify keyboard mastery.

exercises.name: Exercise 13: Paragraph Typing
exercises.description: Type out a coherent paragraph to practice maintaining rhythm over longer texts.
exercises.tasks: I det fjerne hører man en ugle hyle i natten. Mørket klemmer rundt landskapet som en tykk kappe.

exercises.name: Exercise 14: Complex Sentences
exercises.description: Practice typing complex sentences with varied punctuation.
exercises.tasks: Hun, som hadde ventet i timevis, visste at tålmodighet ville lønne seg til slutt.

chapters.name: Numerical Typing
chapters.description: Focus on typing numbers, including numerical data entry and using the numeric keypad if available.

exercises.name: Exercise 15: Numbers and Home Row
exercises.description: Combine numbers with letters in common coding and mathematical scenarios.
exercises.tasks: a1 s2 d3 f4 j7 k8 l9 ø0⏎1a 2s 3d 4f 7j 8k 9l 0ø

exercises.name: Exercise 16: Data Entry Practice
exercises.description: Simulate data entry tasks involving numbers and text.
